name: Make Her Jealous
description:
Would you do anything to get what you want? Do you have what it takes to be a lover? Then you should play Make Her Jealous. There is no limit in this game but it has lots of fun mini games!

- Make a move to your lover at the right time
- Don’t get caught to his girlfriend
- Try to hide your affair
- Become the master at your love relationship

P.S. We don't recommend doing these in real life! It's just a game!
